name: Trenton
description:
Taking place near Britain just after the fall of Rome, Trenton is about a merchant whose name is Trenton. Our merchant is given the opportunity to explore, discover, and salvage many of the great architectures built by the Roman Empire.

Programming, leveldesign by David Krstevski - https://ieida.itch.io/

3D, Art and music by Andreas Mårtensson - https://andreaslbs.itch.io/
